card_text: Activate only as Chain Link 2 or higher; apply the following effects, depending on the Chain Link number of this card, in sequence (skip over any that do not apply). You cannot activate this card if multiple cards/effects with the same name are in that Chain.$N●2+: Excavate the top cards of your Deck, equal to the Chain Link number of this card, then place them on the top of your Deck in any order.$N●3+: Send the top card of your Deck to the GY.$N●4+: Draw 1 card.$NYou can only activate 1 "Surprise Chain" per turn.
